name: Shapechanger's Intuition
summary: A lifetime of experience helps you see through disguises.
description:
A lifetime of experience helps you see through disguises. When you come within 10 feet of a creature that is transformed into another form or is Impersonating a specific creature, the GM rolls a secret Perception check for you to realize that the creature is transformed, even if you didn't spend an action to Seek against that creature.Traits

Kitsune: Shapeshifting humanoids whose true forms resemble foxes.
